attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see a cut in road tax on 4x4 vehicles, the recent cold spell and snow meant that the only safe way to travel by road was by 4x4.Surly this safety should not be penalized and should be encouraged. I would have been trapped in my home for weeks had I not had an  Nissan x trail 4x4.
